title: Electoral Bond Stats
selftext:
Electoral Bond is a very Quiet topic, Every Political Party has Some share of it . But we all know Who gets the highest ....
Sharing what I know.
It was introduced in 2017 budget by Late Arun Jaitley & Finance bill 2017 passed it.
Cons of this 
1)Donar details remain Anonymous 
2) Infringes RTI
3) Legitimizes illegal money in politics
4) No reporting of it 

Govt/Banks have Full KYC details of Us (Taxpayers), but exempts such Donor's from KYC
comments: B.R. Ambedkar : ' Elections are the Progenitor of the Corruption '
Keep this in mind when people claim laws are being made for benefit of common man
Democracy and transparency out of window
This is truly a Government approved & managed, legalized scam.
